snippet: The Da Capo Chamber Players opened its 41st season on Monday with a program of several theatrical scores at Merkin Concert Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Da Capo Chamber Players opened its 41st season on Monday with a program of several theatrical scores at Merkin Concert Hall.

headline.main: Theatrical Offerings and Instruction for Singing Birds
